cases.title: The product adding to the favorites by unregistered user
cases.description: The product adding to the favorites by unregistered user
cases.preconditions:
The website [https://gb.ecco.com/](https://gb.ecco.com/) is opened. The UK language is set.
The user is not registered.

steps.expected_result: The page with the product is opened.

steps.action: Click on the "Add to the favourites" button.
steps.expected_result: The "We save your favourites for 30 days. Sign in to your MY ECCO account to keep them. [Sign in/create an account](https://gb.ecco.com/en-GB/My-ECCO)" tipmessage is displayed.

cases.title: Hovering over the product image.
cases.preconditions:
The website [https://gb.ecco.com/](https://gb.ecco.com/) is opened. The UK language is set.
The user is not registered.

steps.expected_result: The product color suggestion is displayed.
The product size suggestion is displayed.
The "Add to the favorites" image button is displayed.

cases.title: Testing the "Use voucher code" button with invalid data.
cases.description: Testing the "Use voucher code" button with invalid data.
cases.preconditions:
The website [https://gb.ecco.com/](https://gb.ecco.com/) is opened. The UK language is set.
The user is not registered.
The product is added to the cart.

steps.expected_result: The selected product, size, price, color, total price are displayed.

steps.action: Click on the "Use voucher code" drop-down button.

steps.expected_result: The "The voucher code you have entered is not valid for your purchase or does not exist." warning message is displayed.

cases.title: The product adding to the cart by unregistered user
cases.description: The product adding to the cart by unregistered user
cases.preconditions:
The website [https://gb.ecco.com/](https://gb.ecco.com/) is opened. The UK language is set.
The user is not registered.

steps.expected_result: The page with the product is opened.

steps.action: Click on the "Add to basket" button.
steps.expected_result: The "Please select your size!" warning message is displayed.

steps.action: Click on the size that is not available.

steps.expected_result: The available size button is displayed active. The color of the size button is changed.
The color of the size button is changed.

steps.action: Click on the "Add to basket" button.
steps.expected_result: The "Added to basket!" modal window is displayed with two suggestion buttons: "Go to basket" and "Keep shopping".

steps.action: Click on the "Go to basket" button.
steps.expected_result: The selected product, size, price, color, total price are displayed.
